board_of_directors.description: The Board of Directors provides strategic oversight, ensures ethical compliance, and aligns Us with international standards. Comprises 5 external experts in finance, law, and development plus one team representative. The board drives accountability and transparency.

members.name: TBD
members.bio: The Board Chair is an expert in international development. Leads strategic governance to ensure our mission aligns with global standards. Their leadership promotes transparency and sustainable growth.

members.name: Solomon Ssekiranda (Representative)
members.bio: As Executive Director and board liaison, Solomon ensures alignment between operational and governance objectives through his strategic expertise.

members.name: Solomon Ssekiranda
members.bio: Solomon Ssekiranda is a strategic visionary with a B.Ed. from Makerere University and ongoing MBChB studies at Kabale University. Formerly Vice President of FUMSA, he secured high-impact partnerships and led powerful nationwide projects.

members.name: TBD
members.bio: The Deputy Director supports strategic operations, oversees departmental coordination, and ensures resilience in leadership. They drive scalable and impactful programs globally.

members.name: Judith Nahwera
members.bio: Judith Nahwera is a seasoned community development specialist. She designs our scalable programs using her extensive expertise in grassroots mobilization and strategic partnerships to drive measurable impact in underserved communities. She has meticulously foreseen several program evaluations and localized solutions that solidified the transformative benefits of our projects.

members.name: Robinson Byamukama
members.bio: Robinson Byamukama is an MBChB candidate at Kabale University. He spearheads our health programs with unparalleled expertise. As former FUMSA President, he supervised impactful health campaigns and cross-sector collaborations that considerably reduced disparities in underserved regions.

members.name: Stanley Okecho
members.bio: Stanley Okecho optimizes our operations with exceptional organizational acumen and strategic communication expertise. His advanced training in community development enables seamless coordination of complex initiatives. He streamli and amplifying stakeholder engagement, Stanley ensures operational excellence and transparent, impactful communication aligned with global NGO standards.

members.bio: The Finance Officer ensures robust financial management, compliance, and transparent reporting. With expertise in nonprofit accounting, they safeguard Touched Hearts’ fiscal integrity and support sustainable growth.

members.name: Farouk Jjingo
members.bio: Farouk Jjingo, MBChB (Mbarara University), pioneers Touched Hearts’ technological advancements. Founding CareWave+ and EcoSpin, he develops telemedicine and sustainability solutions that redefine rural empowerment. His expertise in digital health and scalable innovation delivers inclusive, high-impact programs, positioning Touched Hearts as a leader in transformative NGO technology.
